message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,100,000. It's a great deal, and I believe it's fair given the value it brings to your business. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I am willing to pay $1,050,000 for it. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between its worth and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I value our potential partnership,  $1,050,000 is still below my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to come down to $1,080,000 to make this work. This price still allows me to cover my costs and make a reasonable profit.  Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand your position and respect the value of your product. I am willing to pay $1,070,000 for it, which I believe strikes a balance between your needs and my budget.
